QuestData.Title: Disaster at Mount Hyjal
QuestData.Description: Our brothers in the Cenarion Circle report that Deathwing's minions have launched a destructive offensive against the world tree and threaten to burn it to the ground!$B$BYou can speak with Cenarion Emissary Blackhoof to gain entry into Moonglade. He is in the tauren district in the Valley of Wisdom in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Cenarion Emissary Blackhoof to secure transportation to Moonglade.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Emissary Windsong at Nighthaven in Moonglade.
